User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64; rv:7.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/7.0.1 Iceweasel/7.0.1
Build ID: 20111015075007

Steps to reproduce:

Go to unified view.
Set search order to unread first, then newest-first
Type a search term in the 'filter' box


Actual results:

Messages matching the search term are displayed unread-first, but
the dates are oldest-first within accounts, and no-obvious-order between accounts.



Expected results:

Messages should be displayed unread-first, then newest first.
This correct behaviour is what happens in individual accounts, but not in unifed view.
